StringsMap.ADVICE_ENTER_ENCRYPTED_INTEGER: Enter the Integer you're desired to Decrypt:
StringsMap.ADVICE_ENTER_PLAIN_INTEGER_FOR_ENCRYPTIO: Enter the Integer you're desired to Encrypt:
StringsMap.ADVICE_ENTER_PLAIN_INTEGER_FOR_ENCODING: Enter the Integer you're desired to Calculate:
StringsMap.ADVICE_ENTER_STRING_FOR_DECODING: Enter the String you're desired to Decode:
StringsMap.ADVICE_ENTER_STRING_FOR_DECRYPTION: Enter the String you're desired to Decrypt:
StringsMap.ADVICE_ENTER_STRING_FOR_DIGEST: Enter the String you're desired to Hash:
StringsMap.ADVICE_ENTER_STRING_FOR_ENCODING: Enter the String you're desired to Encode:
StringsMap.ADVICE_ENTER_STRING_FOR_ENCRYPTION: Enter the String you're desired to Encrypt:
StringsMap.ADVICE_ENTER_VARINT_VALUE: Enter the VarInt value you're desired to Calculate:
StringsMap.DEFAULT_PARAMETER_CIPHER_KEY_SPECIFIC: [Enter a Cipher Key from {0} to {1} Bytes]
StringsMap.DIALOG_DRAG_PATH_FOR_SELECTION: Tip: you can Drag the File/Folder you want to Select instead of Typing its Path manually.
StringsMap.DIALOG_PROGRAM_TERMINATION:
Press '{0}' to Close this Program.
Otherwise, Press '{1}' to return to the main menu.
StringsMap.DIALOG_QUICK_MODE: Here you can Process the File/Folder you've Dragged or Opened with this Program Quickly & Directly.
StringsMap.DIALOG_SELECT_OPTION:
Use '{0}' or '{1}' in order to Move through the Menu.
Press '{2}' for Selecting the Option desired.

In order to Exit the Menu, press '{3}' (your Selection won't be Saved).
StringsMap.DIALOG_SYSTEM_PAUSE: Press '{0}' or any Key to Continue.
StringsMap.PARAM_IGNORE_EXTRA_COMMAS_JSON: Ignore Extra Commas on JSON Files
StringsMap.RESULT_COMPRESS_FILE_FAILED: Failed to Compress the Requested File.
StringsMap.RESULT_COMPRESS_FOLDER_FAILED: Failed to Compress the Requested Folder.
StringsMap.RESULT_COPY_FILE_FAILED: Failed to Copy the Requested File.
StringsMap.RESULT_COPY_FOLDER_FAILED: Failed to Copy the Requested Folder.
StringsMap.RESULT_CREATE_DIRECT_ACCESS_FAILED: Failed to Create the Direct Access.
StringsMap.RESULT_CREATE_FILE_FAILED: Failed to Create the Requested File.
StringsMap.RESULT_CREATE_FOLDER_FAILED: Failed to Create the Requested Folder.
StringsMap.RESULT_DECODE_FILE_FAILED: Failed to Decode the Requested File.
StringsMap.RESULT_DECODE_FOLDER_FAILED: Failed to Decode the Requested Folder.
StringsMap.RESULT_DECOMPRESS_FILE_FAILED: Failed to Decompress the Requested File.
StringsMap.RESULT_DECOMPRESS_FOLDER_FAILED: Failed to Decompress the Requested Folder.
StringsMap.RESULT_DECRYPT_FILE_FAILED: Failed to Decrypt the Requested File.
StringsMap.RESULT_DECRYPT_FOLDER_FAILED: Failed to Decrypt the Requested Folder.
StringsMap.RESULT_DELETE_FILE_FAILED: Failed to Delete the Requested File.
StringsMap.RESULT_DELETE_FOLDER_FAILED: Failed to Delete the Requested Folder.
StringsMap.RESULT_ENCODE_FILE_FAILED: Failed to Encode the Requested File.
StringsMap.RESULT_ENCODE_FOLDER_FAILED: Failed to Encode the Requested Folder.
StringsMap.RESULT_ENCRYPT_FILE_FAILED: Failed to Encrypt the Requested File.
StringsMap.RESULT_ENCRYPT_FOLDER_FAILED: Failed to Encrypt the Requested Folder.
StringsMap.RESULT_HASH_FILE_FAILED: Failed to Hash the Requested File.
StringsMap.RESULT_HASH_FOLDER_FAILED: Failed to Hash the Requested Folder.
StringsMap.RESULT_MOVE_FILE_FAILED: Failed to Move the Requested File.
StringsMap.RESULT_MOVE_FOLDER_FAILED: Failed to Move the Requested Folder.
StringsMap.RESULT_RENAME_FILE_FAILED: Failed to Rename the Requested File.
StringsMap.RESULT_RENAME_FOLDER_FAILED: Failed to Rename the Requested Folder.
StringsMap.TASK_STATUS_CREATED: The task has been created, but has not been executed yet.
StringsMap.TASK_STATUS_FAILED: Failed to complete the requested task.
StringsMap.TASK_STATUS_WAITING_CHILDREN_COMPLETION: The task is waiting for an attached child task to complete.
StringsMap.TASK_STATUS_WAITING_FOR_ACTIVATION: The task is waiting for activation.
StringsMap.TASK_STATUS_WAITING_TO_EXECUTION: The task is waiting for execution.
StringsMap.USER_SELECTION_BASE64_SECURITY_MODE:
Press '{0}' to Truncate the strings after Encoding.
Otherwise, Press '{1}' to Encode the strings normally with Base64.
StringsMap.USER_SELECTION_BUFFER_SIZE: Set how Many Bytes or Kilobytes you want to Process in Blocks on Buffer Operations (like File Reading or Writting).
StringsMap.USER_SELECTION_COMMAS_TRAILING:
Press '{0}' so Extra Commas should be Ignored at the End of JSON Arrays and JSON Objects.

Otherwise, Press '{1}' if you don't want to allow Trailing Commas on JSON Files (Exceptions will be Raised when Encoding Data).
StringsMap.USER_SELECTION_CURSOR_VIEW:
Press '{0}' so the Cursor will be Displayed on Screen.
Otherwise, Press '{1}' for Hiding the Cursor.
StringsMap.USER_SELECTION_DATE_TIME:
Write a DateTime as a numerical Date and Time of Day.

The Date must be separated by Bars ('{0}').
On the other hand, the Time must go between Colons ('{1}'), followed by a Meridian ("{2}" or "{3}").

Entering the whole value is not necessary (you can just Input a single Date or a single Time).
StringsMap.USER_SELECTION_DIGEST_AUTH_MODE:
Press '{0}' in order to Hash your Data by using HMAC (a Cipher Key is needed).
Otherwise, Press '{1}' in order to Hash your Data normally.
StringsMap.USER_SELECTION_FILES_REPLACEMENT:
Press '{0}' in order to Overwrite the files with new ones.
Otherwise, Press '{1}' for Preventing the replacement of existing files.
StringsMap.USER_SELECTION_FORMATTING_INDENTED:
Press '{0}' for Indenting your Data with Spaces and new Lines.
Otherwise, Press '{1}' for using a Linear Format on your Data (no separation between Spaces).
StringsMap.USER_SELECTION_JSON_VALIDATION:
Press '{0}' for Skipping JSON Validation.
Otherwise, Press '{1}' for Checking the Syntax on JSON Files.
(Skipping JSON Validation means Writting Data to JSON Files even if they are Errors on the Syntax)
StringsMap.USER_SELECTION_KEY_FLAGS:
Press '{0}' for using Private Keys when Ciphering Files.
Otherwise, Press '{1}' for using Publid Keys instead.
StringsMap.USER_SELECTION_OAEP:
'OAEP' stands for "Optimal Asymetric Encryption Padding".

Press '{0}' for Padding the Data with OAEP.
Otherwise, Press '{1}' if you don't need to Fill your Data with Padding.
StringsMap.USER_SELECTION_REFERENCE_STRINGS_USAGE:
Press '{0}' for using Reference Strings when Parsing RTON Files.

Otherwise, Press '{1}' for omitting the Usage of Reference Strings when Parsing the Files.
(If true, the Strings will be Loaded when Encoding a RTON File, and will be Saved when Decoding the File)
StringsMap.USER_SELECTION_SIGN_MODE:
Press '{0}' for performing Calculations with Signed values.
Otherwise, Press '{1}' for Calculating Unsigned values.
StringsMap.WARNING_BEWARE_WHEN_EDITING_FILE:
You can change the Info by Pressing '{0}' in the {1} of this Program or by Editing the "{2}" File.

NOTE: please, be careful when Editing the Params file. Any mistake can make it useless.
StringsMap.WARNING_INVALID_KEY_LENGTH:
Cipher Key Length is Invalid.
In order to avoid exceptions, the Key will be Changed to a similar one that meets the Length expected.
StringsMap.WARNING_MISSING_PARAMS_FILE:
The Params file does not Exist on this Device or is Empty.
In order to avoid Issues, the Params file will be Generated with default Values stored on it.
StringsMap.WARNING_MISSING_REFERENCE_STRINGS_CONTAI:
The Reference Strings Container for "{0}" does not Exist on this Device or is Empty.
Only local Strings will be Used as a Reference when Decoding the File.
StringsMap.WARNING_MISSING_SETTINGS_FILE:
The Settings file does not Exist on this Device or is Empty.
In order to avoid Issues, the Settings file will be Generated with default Settings stored on it.
StringsMap.WARNING_PRESS_EXIT_OR_RETURN_KEY:
No valid Key was Pressed.

If you want to Return to the Main Menu, Press '{0}' before the Countdown reaches Zero.
Otherwise, Press '{1}' to Exit.

(If no Key is Pressed, the Program will Close after {2} Seconds).
